headline: Itron, PG&E expand collaboration to create more reliable, flexible grid
summary: Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PCG) and Itron (ITRI) are on the next phase of their collaboration to “transform the energy landscape, enhance the customer experience, reduce wildfire risk and create a more reliable and flexible grid,” the company said. “This collaboration is about innovating to improve the lives of California’s families and businesses,” said Mike Delaney, Vice President, Strategy & Innovation, PG&E. “By using grid-edge technology and real-time data, we can make it easier for

headline: Gridware Study Finds Active Grid Response Technology, Enabled by Gridscopes, Improves Power Reliability While Mitigating Wildfire Ignitions
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, February 04, 2026--Gridware Study Finds Active Grid Response Technology Improves Power Reliability While Mitigating Wildfire Ignitions.

content.title: Gridware Study Finds Active Grid Response Technology, Enabled by Gridscopes, Improves Power Reliability While Mitigating Wildfire Ignitions
content.summary: SAN FRANCISCO, February 04, 2026--Gridware Study Finds Active Grid Response Technology Improves Power Reliability While Mitigating Wildfire Ignitions.

thumbnail.caption: Line workers install Gridware Gridscope devices on power poles. Fast-to-deploy Active Grid Response (AGR) technologies, like these, installed in combination with fast-trip settings and public safety power shutoff (PSPS), provide immediate risk mitigation.

headline: Team FireSwarm Advances as One of Five Finalists In Autonomous Track of the $11M XPRIZE Wildfire Competition
summary: Canadian-led alliance earns finalist status in a global challenge accelerating autonomous wildfire detection and suppressionSQUAMISH, British Columbia, Feb. 04, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- FireSwarm Solutions Inc., a Canadian autonomous aerial systems company and the original applicant to the XPRIZE Wildfire competition, today announced it has advanced to the finals of the Autonomous Wildfire Response Track in collaboration with its partners as Team FireSwarm Solutions.
